title: Fuel-range liquid hydrocarbon products from catalytic deoxygenation of mixtures of fatty acids obtained from the hydrolysis of rapeseed oil
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00864B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Morenike A. Peters, Jude A. Onwudili, Jiawei Wang
The combined hydrolysis–deoxygenation method reported here demonstrates the efficiency of hydrogen-free catalytic conversion of lipid-derived multi-fatty acids into renewable drop-in hydrocarbon biofuels.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
